Author: Regnar#6164
Content: I have been thinking about useful features for blockchain games to have, I think having easy access to multiplayer information like PvP results, and a really simple way to get a Streaming key (like for Twitch) would be huge. I'm not sure what information will be visible on a block explorer, so having a way to read match results would really help with leaderboard and gambling sites . And the streaming key (OBS is open source <https://obsproject.com/>) would be helpful for getting the word out and showing the gameplay.

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: I'm pretty new to "streaming" games, so I'm not sure what exactly goes into the key. I figured you'd have more info on that, but overall I think it could prove useful to help spread awareness

Simple solution.
If gamestate and rules are onchain, cross play also much easier because of unified data format (protocol + state) for a game, its characters etc.
